summary.Title: Ship Electricians Wanted
summary.Presentation:
We are looking for:

Ship Electricians

for marine industry in Danmark 
Scan Con offers jobs at the Shipyards on Reparation and New Build Depar

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for:

  • Ship Electricians

for marine industry in Danmark 

Scan Con offers jobs at the Shipyards on Reparation and New Build Departments. 

Key tasks:

  • Responsible for installing, repairing, and maintaining electrical systems on ships
  • Troubleshoot, diagnose electrical problems and find solutions
  • Maintain electrical equipment and oversee the installation of new electrical systems
  • Read and interpret drawings, blueprints, schematics and electrical code specifications to determine layout of industrial electrical equipment installations
  • Install, examine, replace or repair electrical wiring, receptacles, switch boxes, conduits, feeders, fibre-optic and coaxial cable assemblies, lighting fixtures and other electrical components
  • Test electrical and electronic equipment and components for continuity, current, voltage and resistance
  • May install, maintain and calibrate industrial instrumentation and related devices
  • Performs other duties as required

Skills:

  • English - must be able to communicate in English 
  • Must know how to read and interpret various types of plans and sketches
  • Always attentive to detail and alert to ensure safety
  • Ability to receive and follow instructions and communicate with co-workers
  • Ability to read labels, safety warnings, and guidelines
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team

Experience:

  • Experience from shipyards 
  • Education or professional experience in a given position

We offer you:

  • Attractive salary 
  • 37 hours per week with possibilities for overtime
  • Flight tickets
  • Transport to/ from job 
  • Accommodation 
  • Rotation 6 - 12 months 
  • Safety courses
  • Work tools and clothes
  • Help with Work Permit/VISA 
  • Health insurance / Medical help

Occupation.Name: Elektriker
AlternateNames: Tekniker inden for belysningssystemer i lufthavne
Elektriker med speciale i rullende materiel
Elektriker med speciale i reparation af husholdningsapparater
